text: hi I'm a meal card at AWS AWS offers
many services that are instance based
this includes services such as ec2 RDS
and several more ec2 alone offers more
than 60 instance types giving you the
option to select the choice that is most
appropriate for your application however
the best instance does not always mean
selecting the largest or most powerful
option instead you can benefit from the
deep portfolio of options AWS offers so
you can right size for your application
saving money and helping you meet your
business needs right sizing is
essentially choosing the cheapest
instance while meeting performance
requirements it is also the process to
look at deployed instances and look for
opportunities to downsize when possible
without compromising capacity or other
technical requirements right sizing can
help your organization save money
without compromising your business needs
remember scaling up is easy so always
start small
